master:
1. Clear all ｢Master Missions｣ for this week

2. Defeat 20 Saber, Archer or Lancer enemies. (non-servant, non-boss)

3. Defeat 15 Archer enemies. (non-servant, non-boss)

4. Defeat 20 Rider, Caster, Assassin or Berserker enemies. (non-servant, non-boss)

5. Defeat 15 Rider enemies. (non-servant, non-boss)

6. Defeat 15 Caster enemies. (non-servant, non-boss)

7. Complete 10 Quests of any kind.
